oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers College vs Southwestern College: Homecoming 1967
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Programs; Homecomings; Basketball
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: CBC's Buccaneers played the Lynx of Southwestern at Memphis for the homecoming game of 1967. The program featured the a message from the president, the finalists for homecoming queen, the basketball team, the CBC cheerleaders, the Bucs' baseball schedule, and various advertisements. The game was played in the De La Salle Gymnasium before a crowd of 2,300. CBC won narrowly, 60-58, due to the efforts of Ed "Ace" Martin and his last minute basket.
